history.proof: intros a b c. split. - intros H. apply Rlt_minus_r in H. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rlt_div_r. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rplus_comm,Rlt_div_r. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rplus_opp_r,Rplus_comm,Rlt_div_r. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rplus_opp_r,Rplus_comm,Rlt_div_r. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rplus_opp_r,Rplus_comm,Rlt_div_r. scongruence use: Ropp_involutive unfold: Rminus. - intros H. qauto use: Rle_minus_l, Rplus_comm, Rlt_dichotomy_converse, Rplus_minus unfold: Rle.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b <-> a < b / c" on hypothesis of type "a < b - - c".
The LHS of Rplus_comm (_ + _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rplus_opp_r (_ + - _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H4 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 + r2 = r2 + r1 H3 : forall r : R, r + - r = 0 a, b, c : R H : a < b - - c H0 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a < b / c -> a * c < b H1 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b -> a < b / c Unable to unify "a < b - - c" with "a < b + c".

In environment H5 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 + r2 = r2 + r1 H2 : forall r : R, r + - r = 0 a, b, c : R H : a < b - - c H0 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a < b / c -> a * c < b H1 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b -> a < b / c Unable to unify "a < b - - c" with "a < b + c".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a / c < b <-> a < b * c" on hypothesis of type "a < b + c".
The LHS of Rplus_opp_r (_ + - _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H7 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 + r2 = r2 + r1 H6 : forall r : R, r + - r = 0 a, b, c : R H2 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a < b / c -> a * c < b H4 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b -> a < b / c H3 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a < b * c -> a / c < b H5 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a / c < b -> a < b * c H : a < c + b Unable to unify "a < c + b" with "a - c < b".

In environment H1 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 + r2 = r2 + r1 H0 : forall r : R, r + - r = 0 a, b, c : R H2 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a < b / c -> a * c < b H4 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a * c < b -> a < b / c H3 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a < b * c -> a / c < b H5 : forall a b c : R, c > 0 -> a / c < b -> a < b * c H : a < c + b Unable to unify "a < c + b" with "a - c < b".

original: intros a b c. split. - intros H. apply Rlt_minus_r in H. apply Rlt_div_r with (c := 1) in H. + rewrite Rplus_comm in H. rewrite Rplus_opp_r in H. apply H. + apply H. - intros H. apply Rlt_div_l with (c := 1) in H. + rewrite Rplus_comm in H. rewrite Rplus_opp_r in H. apply H. + apply H.
